PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-12172022-11-17HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActPest Control Products Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Pest Control Products Regulations (Applications and Imports)
PrecisRegulations Amending the PEST CONTROL PRODUCTS REGULATIONS (APPLICATIONS AND IMPORTS) in order to (1) streamline requirements for certain manufacturing site information and formulant supplier information; (2) extend the validity periods for certain emergency registrations to up to three years; (3) make technical amendments; (4) codify current processes for certain treated articles, antimicrobials, and food additives; and (5) align import declaration requirements with current information-collection practices.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0241 Publication Date: 2022-12-07
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Pest Control Products Regulations (Applications and Imports)
precis: Regulations Amending the PEST CONTROL PRODUCTS REGULATIONS (APPLICATIONS AND IMPORTS) in order to (1) streamline requirements for certain manufacturing site information and formulant supplier information; (2) extend the validity periods for certain emergency registrations to up to three years; (3) make technical amendments; (4) codify current processes for certain treated articles, antimicrobials, and food additives; and (5) align import declaration requirements with current information-collection practices.
